Package com.spleefleague.core.game.battle

Class Battle<BP extends BattlePlayer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spleefleague.core.game.battle.Battle<BP>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BonanzaBattle, DynamicBattle, SoloBattle, TeamBattle, VersusBattle
    public abstract class Battle<BP extends BattlePlayer>
extends java.lang.Object
    A Battle is an object that contains an arena that the game is played in and a set of players (battlers, spectators)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addBattler​(CorePlayer cp)
      Adds a player to the battle, creates a Battle Player and sets player's battle state to BATTLER If a player is a party leader and the mode is team based then add all party members to the battle list
      protected void addBattleRequest​(BattleRequest battleRequest)  
      void addGlobalSpectator​(CorePlayer cp)
      Adds a global spectator to the battle when they enter the global spectator boundaries of the arena, which is a spectator who isn't teleport away at the end of the battle
      void addSpectator​(CorePlayer cp, CorePlayer target)
      Add a spectator to the battle, if there is no spectator spawn the spectator is set to GameMode 3 and forced to first person spectator of target
      void cancel()
      Moderator cancel for battles
      void doCountdown()
      Called every second Counts down the start of a round
      void endBattle()
      Ends a battle, removes all players, destroys game world
      protected abstract void endBattle​(BP winner)
      End a battle with a determined winner
      protected abstract void endRound​(BP winner)
      End a round with a determined winner
      protected abstract void failBattler​(CorePlayer cp)
      Called when a battler leaves boundaries
      protected abstract void fillField()  
      Arena getArena()  
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAvailableRequests​(CorePlayer cp)  
      ChatGroup getChatGroup()
      Returns the chat group of this battle
      protected BP getClosestBattler​(CorePlayer cp)
      Returns the closest battler (non-fallen) to the player If no players are alive, returns null
